Downloading 0.2 kb/s awesome xd

asd-08 and everyone requesting the pro version:

This image provides both the core and the pro version. Installing using either of the keys provided by the uploader in an ealier comment will give you the corresponding version of windows 8(with the ability to change it later).

These are, as mentioned, the original MSDN images, and they can be installed using either the retail keys or the VL keys.(the keys posted are retail keys)

Neither key will successfully activate, so using the VL key will require you to find a working KMS-server(non online at this point) and using the retail keys will require you to activate windows later using an OEM-loader if one becomes available.(seemes unlikely at this time given the improved security of the OEM activation process).

For good measure here is the default keys allowing you to install this as both core and pro as well as retail and VL:

Retail
Core = FB4WR-32NVD-4RW79-XQFWH-CYQG3
Professional = XKY4K-2NRWR-8F6P2-448RF-CRYQH

Volume
gvlkCore=BN3D2-R7TKB-3YPBD-8DRP2-27GG4
gvlkProfessional=NG4HW-VH26C-733KW-K6F98-J8CK4

plz upload

Windows 8 Pro VL (x64) - DVD (English)
en_windows_8_pro_vl_x64_dvd_917699.iso

Volume MAK Key for Enterprise VL
PF9TR-KNB98-T7JPF-TWF8W-F3G7C

How to activate your Windows 8 Pro/Enterprise:

1. Run cmd as admin. Enter slmgr /ipk PF9TR-KNB98-T7JPF-TWF8W-F3G7C (Only for Enterprise and Pro)
2. Turn off your internet connection
3. Open activation window and click "Activate". It'll show your an error.
4. After that you'll see "Activate by phone" button.
5. Call to microsoft and enter code from message, which you will see.
6. If they ask about number of computer, where you will use this key, say 1
